Posts.Content: I will certainly check out the place in Austin. I have heard of the ph balance diets and have it saved on my pc and refer to it often. I imagine it is Dr. Day. but would love to have the entire resource. Since no one seems too worried about diagnosing me, I might as well visit this place in the meantime. I work in Austin nearly every week.
Posts.Title: Maintaining Alkaline ph For Cancer Prevention

Posts.Content: I live near Austin, Texas? Tell what you know of treatment there and send me any links.
